meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of rodents.
meanings.sent1: The small, rodential creatures scurried across the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the rodential behavior of mice in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The rodential family of squirrels had a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her quick, rodential movements in the game made her a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the rodential features of the hamster.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a rodent in some way.
meanings.sent1: The toy had a cute, rodential face that made it popular with kids.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a musty smell, reminiscent of rodential nests.
meanings.sent3: The rodential puppet show at the fair was a hit with the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp, rodential teeth gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of rodential cuteness perfectly.
